Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Decks

Class ResourceDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Decks.ResourceDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Draw
public class ResourceDeck extends Object implements Draw
ResourceDeck take the data from the json file e send them to the constructor of the starter cards

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ResourceDeck()
    This constructor, using gson methods, take cards info from the json, send them the to the resource cards constructor and put the card created in the array that represents the deck and shuffles it

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Player player, int i) throws EmptyDeckException
      The method lets the caller draw a ResourceCard from the deck (i = null) or one of the 2 on the table (i = 0 or i = 1)
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Draw
      Parameters:
      player - This parameter is used to give the card extracted to the player passed
      i - This parameter allows the caller to choose which card to draw
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException
